name: Christmas at Bute Park
description: Christmas at Bute Park is Wales' premier festive light trail, welcoming over half a million visitors to the heart of Cardiff since its launch in 2021. This enchanting mile-long illuminated journey winds through Bute Park's picturesque grounds in the shadow of historic Cardiff Castle, featuring 15 mesmerising light zones created by world-leading lighting designers. Music-synchronized lighting installations, interactive displays, and magical moments await visitors of all ages on this 60-90 minute stroll through a glowing winter wonderland. The Christmas Village adds to the experience with crackling local food, delicious drinks, and plenty of festive cheer, making it an unmissable night out for families, friends, and couples alike.
